remarks: Alternate definition of the image of a function.  (Contributed by Raph Levien, 20-Nov-2006.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2017.)
statement:
dfimafnf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
dfimafnf.2 $e |- F/_ x F $.
dfimafnf $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A C_ dom F ) -> ( F " A ) = { y | E. x e. A y = ( F ` x ) } ) $.
$d A y $.
$d F y $.
$d x y $.
